pageContent: Purpose: To determine the extent of cell proliferation and apoptosis during treatment and progression of prostate cancer and to determine whether staining for tissue transglutaminase is a better histological marker than TUNEL for neoadjuvant androgen ablation treatment of localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
[Diagnosis and treatment of incidental prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25211935/
